Industry Metadata

industry_metadata.Rd

Contains a lookup table between industry codes and Chinese names, along with detailed descriptions of each industry.

Usage

industry_metadata

Format

A data frame with 9 rows and 3 columns:

code

Character, industry code abbreviation

name_label

Character, industry name

description

Character, detailed industry description

Examples

# View industry metadata
data(industry_metadata)
print(industry_metadata)
#>     code        name_label
#> BAS  BAS   Basic Materials
#> CSD  CSD Consumer Services
#> CST  CST Consumer Products
#> ENE  ENE            Energy
#> FIN  FIN        Financials
#> HEA  HEA        Healthcare
#> IND  IND       Industrials
#> REA  REA       Real Estate
#> TEC  TEC        Technology
#>                                                                               description
#> BAS                Chemical, metal, building materials, and other raw material industries
#> CSD                                Retail, tourism, catering, and other consumer services
#> CST Food, household appliances, daily necessities, and other consumer goods manufacturing
#> ENE                      Petroleum, natural gas, electricity, and other energy industries
#> FIN                        Banks, insurance, securities, and other financial institutions
#> HEA                                Pharmaceuticals, medical devices, and medical services
#> IND                        Machinery, electronics, transportation equipment manufacturing
#> REA                                          Real estate development, property management
#> TEC                                                       Software, hardware, IT services
